thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mr Michael Walsh
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr Michael Walsh

author: Mr Michael Walsh
title: Mr Michael Walsh
text:
Living in the States now, and having been a Munster Rugby supporter for years, I ordered a 18 Euro beanie on line. The shipping cost was equal to the merchandise, but to be expected.
Their website was very informative for each of their extensive products and their e-mail with the tracking number was sent out immediately. I was able to track the small package daily on a rather circuitous route.
Very pleased with every aspect of this transaction.
